transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello. Hello. Mr. Ranjan baat kar rahe hain IndiaMART se?

Customer: Direct solution se.

Executive: Bolie sir. Actually kal feedback aapka aaya tha product ke liye mein. Bas wohi jaanna tha sir. Kya issue aa rahi hai, from IndiaMART se?

Customer: Issue hai hamara technical person hai Gaurav.

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji, sun raha hu sir, yes.

Executive: Woh hamara kya hai, hamara company ka representative hai. Kya hai?

Customer: Right, right.

Executive: Woh aadmi mere ko renew ka date diya tha. Isliye main previous month mein renew kiya amount.

Executive: Sir aapka date toh wahi rahega na sir. Jo aapka jo end date hai mein aapko bata deta hu sir. Toh aapka end date hai.

Customer: Nahi nahi, hamara date hamara register mein February hai.

Executive: Aapka sir date 8th of January hai last date. Toh aapka jo end date hai na sir next year woh 2027 8th of January hai sir. Woh wahi rehne wala hai. Sir hum hum manager Rajan sir nahi hai. Hamara naam Biju hai. Hum idhar se manage karta hai. But yeh matter ke liye hamara company se galat satay karta hai humko, hamare ke liye.

Executive: Theek hai sir. Yeh toh aapko benefit bhi toh diya hai na isme sir price ka benefit.

Customer: Benefit chodo, benefit chodo. Hamara renewal date February hai. Isliye hamara problem hai. Otherwise tumhara company mein mail dalo. Mere ko koi issue nahi hai. Yeh hum abhi hamara hamara issue hai.

Executive: Aapko kya mail chahiye sir? Main aapko mail kar deta hu sir ki aapka jo end date hai that will remain same. Aapne jo amount pay kiya hai aisa nahi hai usme kuch aapko loss hua hai sir. Samajh gaye sir. That will remain same.

Customer: Yeh hamara ek health policy mein tu check kar. Health policy mein kaun sa date mein renew karta hai?

Executive: Sir koi bhi sir isse aap agar aap pre renewal stage pe karte hain toh company aapko uska benefit deti hai. Samajh gaye sir. Aisa nahi hai sir aap koi bhi cheez pre renewal stage pe karte hain aapko waha pe loss hota hai sir. Aapka benefit hota hai sir.

Customer: Right sir.

Executive: Abhi aap yeh bataiye sir iske alawa sir in terms of service mein aapki kya help kar sakta hu? Waha pe kya issue aa raha hai aapko abhi? Toh aapne amount toh pay kar diya sir. Abhi service mein aapko kya mere se chahiye sir?

Customer: Sir around teen months ke liye toh hamara payment tumhare company mein dead investment karta hai.

Executive: Sir uska service bhi toh aapko mil raha hai na sir. Hum aapko service bhi toh de rahe hain sir.

Customer: Kaun sa service?

Executive: Sir service matlab IndiaMART. Actually February month mein hamara previous amount hai tumhare paas.

Executive: Main aapko exact date bata du sir. Recorded line pe aapko bata raha hu sir. Aapne jo initial payment aapko kiya tha 3rd of January ko kiya tha 2025 mein. Toh aapka jo end date hai na sir next year woh 2027 8th of January hai sir. Woh wahi rehne wala hai usme change ek bhi din se piche nahi ho sakta hai.

Customer: Sir actually tumhare company mein iska practical side mein tumhare company mein ek ek letter mere company mein mail karo. Yeh hum sab ji ek hamara condition hai.

Executive: Mail sir aapke paas already aaya hua hai. Kyun mail nahi dal diya?

Customer: 90 days 90 days pehle hum aapko remind karte hain sir service ka renewal due hai sir just to remind you kyunki dekhiye service aapko. Sir remind ka problem nahi hai. Remind ka problem tumhara okay condition acceptable hai. Yeh payment dalo payment dalo woh Gaurav kitna time mere ko call kiya. Payment dalo payment dalo.

Executive: Sir woh toh karenge sir aapka service hai hum aapko remind karenge sir Gaurav ki job toh yahi hai na ki aapko remind kare sir. Samajh gaye sir. Hum aapko remind karenge tabhi toh aap timely isko kar payenge. Baki aapka service mein aap bataiye kal jo aapka feedback aaya Gaurav se related hai sir. Kya aap Gaurav ke service se satisfied nahi hai sir usme aap bataiye usme main aapki kya help kar sakta hu? Ki kya issue raha hai sir buylead aapko nahi aa rahi hai sir call nahi aa rahi hai. Uspe workout karte hain sir kyunki aapne amount toh invest kiya hi hai na sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Toh aapko inquiry calls aa rahi hai.

Customer: Theek hai abhi mere ko mail daliye main hamare manager ko bhejta hu.

Executive: Kya mail chahiye aapko bataiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Renewal date is showing January instead of February.

- Payment is a dead investment for three months.

- Too many calls for payment reminders.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the end date is January 8, 2027.

- Explained the benefits of pre-renewal stage.

- Offered help with service-related issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will forward the mail to manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal date, payment, service, reminders
